https://tmrev.io/movie/9750-Balls of Fury 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/obrDHxgyGcrbCpKbfsqOICeYy7S.jpg Randy Daytona was a child ping pong prodigy who lost his chance at Olympic gold when his father is murdered by the mysterious Feng over a gambling debt. 15yrs later he's down on his luck and scraping a living doing seedy back room shows in Vegas; when the FBI turn up and ask for his help to take down Feng... who just happens to love Ping Pong. Balls of Fury
